property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ 'Civil Count 3': If you have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, this creature gets +2000 power and "double breaker".

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each turn, the first time one of your dragons attacks, untap it. ■ If you have a dragon, this creature gets +3000 power. ■ 'Civil Count 3': If you have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, each of your other creatures gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures or tamaseeds that costs 6 or less and destroy it. ■ 'Civil Count 3': When you put this creature, if you don't have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or tamaseeds, destroy this creature.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-SD1 Start WIN Deck: Dragon Army of Bolshack

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Fire Bird from among them to your opponent and add it to your hand. Put the rest on bottom of your deck in any order. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each Fire Bird in your graveyard.

property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Your Dragons may each cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 1 or less.
